content.text: Acilia is a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum who participated in a tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi.
Acilia is a large and bulky woman. She has dark colored lipstick, and dark colored hair. She is seen with a jolly smile, and sports an armored helmet.

images.caption: Acilia's concept art from the anime.

content.text: Unlike most of the citizens of Dressrosa, Acilia does not scorn Rebecca for her heritage as King Riku's granddaughter. Acilia also advised her to have courage if she wished to win the Mera Mera no Mi.

Acilia has an extremely high level of strength as in the anime, she could set Rebecca free from Logan's grip by striking his arm once, and with her shield, she could defend against his extremely powerful punches despite Logan's massive physical strength.

Acilia was seen wielding an axe and is highly skilled in using it as she defeated multiple powerful competitors in a few attacks. She carries a shield she uses to fend off attacks from her enemies. She was able to block several attacks from Rolling Logan in the anime.
Acilia entered the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. For the battle royale, she was placed in Block D.
Later, during the Block D round, Acilia and Rebecca partnered up and fought side by side. Acilia said that she wanted to make sure Rebecca reached the next round.

When twenty fighters remained, Cavendish's alter-ego Hakuba suddenly surfaced and proceeded to strike down all the remaining fighters in Block D. Acilia fell victim to his attack and laid defeated on the arena floor.

elements.text: In the manga, Acilia was defeated by Hakuba at the end of Block D. In the anime, she was defeated by Suleiman while protecting Rebecca.
Acilia vs. Corrida Colosseum Block D gladiators (except Rebecca)
A gladiatrix was the female counterpart to the male gladiator. There is a record of a gladiatrix named "Achillia".
Acilia is left-handed, as she is seen holding her axe with her left hand.
